website_summaries.verdict: This little food truck is chock-full of fun activities for toddlers. Comes with loads of features for hours of educational and entertaining role-playing fun.
pros: Dual sides combined with a combo vehicle and kitchen design makes this a great option for group play
Boasts a host of enthralling features like a light up grill, service bell, sound enhanced cash register, turning steering wheel, click key, and more
Although designed for toddlers, older kids often like playing along
Helps little ones learn about shapes, sizes, counting, and improves vocabulary
cons: We’d prefer it if it was just a little bit bigger

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, catchy, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this!! Its super cute and the levels are great! I actually like all the sings too haha my girls seem to enjoy it. We've had it since July and they are now 2 and 10 months. The smoothies and pizza are their favorite pieces. I definitely recommend this toy. It also saves space verses a huge play kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Day

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 7 months ago for my son. He was about 9 months old at the time and still loved pulling himself up on it and playing with all the pieces. Now he's almost a year and a half and it's still his favorite toy. He loves for me to get it all set up and he likes messing with each item. My 7 year old twins also will play with it for a few minutes. It's a great long lasting toy. We also bought it for a friend's birthday party and their family loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It is a great imaginary toy for him
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this often for Christmas...and he plays with it all of the time. It was a little bit of a hassle to set up (thank you husband) but my son plays with it a ton so it was worth it. It has cute sounds for cooking and the different items in the truck. My son goes behind it and loves selling me, the food and pretends to drive away. It is a great imaginary toy for him...and works on counting and colors and things like that. His older sister (12) will even play with it too haha (but I'm sure she wouldn't admit to it to other people).
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Ever
customer_reviews.text: My fiance’s 20mo is in love with this! It has so many fun and educational ways to play! He played for hours with us, and the next morning was the same. Believe it will be a continued favorite whenever we get time with him. He loved that I found the hook inside to hang the spatula. My only suggestion for improvement of pls would be a horn that beeps, and maybe some driving sounds when the gears are played with. Wasn’t too terribly difficult to construct, have a screwdriver ready. Can’t beleive the amazing price I was able to purchase this at! Under 60 was a steal! I had so much fun playing with him, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim in AZ

customer_reviews.title: My 2-year old great goddaughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old great goddaughter loves this. The grill and faucet even sound like a sizzling skillet and actual running water. She loves putting the hamburger together and pretending to eat it. She likes serving the food and has learned to ask for money for it. Just about everything you touch either sings or talks. It teaches numbers, sizes, shapes, etc. Even her 5-year- old brother likes to play with it. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Warren

customer_reviews.title: Cute little food truck. Lots of nooks and places to put “things”
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together with a Phillips screwdriver, cute food items like a stackable hamburger with lettuce, tomato and bacon, and patty; a taco with removable part, a pizza with 4 numbered parts that can be taken apart; a plate, fork and spatula; 3 cups with straws; and more. Can be tipped but hasn’t tipped completely over yet. Could be made of stronger plastic but I don’t think things are made sturdy like they used to be. Takes 3 AA batteries for sounds. 4 menu cards with slots, also can be placed in cash register for more phrases, little steering wheel turns around, and more. All in all, I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: 3yo LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo has this play set at his daycare and all the kids are obsessed with it. Purchased this for his 3rd birthday a few days ago and I can't even explain the excitement this kid has over this toy. It's very well made, seems like it'll hold up for a long time. The interactive part of it is probably the best. It talks about the actual food items he's playing with when he's playing with them. And he LOVES to cook for me. I've been eating plastic hamburgers and tacos for the past 45 minutes! Lol highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy, beware though, sound might not work
customer_reviews.text: Was very quick to assemble and directions were easy to follow. All I needed was a screw driver. My son loved this, but the only issue is the sound doesn't work. Put a fresh set of triple a batteries as instructed, placed them in correctly and even after turning on the switch no sound. I dont know if we got a defective item or what but it's a but disappointing because the sound would of really made this toy that much better.
customer_reviews.author: a.m.seay

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, who will be 4 in February saw this toy in a Target Christmas book. He jumped up and down saying he needed a food truck. His Mom thought he was too old for it, but I could see the love and want in his eyes and said..I’ll get it. When he saw me he told me he was sad he didn’t get his food truck. Then he opened my gift...jumping, screaming and excited beyond words. He said Now I’m happy! Played with it all day...loves it It’s so darling. Educational too. One happy grandson
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.G

customer_reviews.title: but it's a nice toy--high quality
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year old LOVES this food truck! It was much smaller than I expected it to be, but it's a nice toy--high quality. The food pieces are super cute and the truck has a lot of sound features. The grill lights up and so does the service bell. We were disappointed, though, that the truck itself makes no car sounds---a honking horn or engine sound would have been neat when she pretends to drive it. I would have rated this toy a 5 star, but since it was much smaller than I felt I was lead to believe, I can only give it a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Seate-beck

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old grandson has had this for about 2 months. He plays with the food, utensils, "smoothies", order cards, cash register, grill, and steering wheel. He turns the open sign on and pushes buttons. It definitely keeps him busy and exploring everything he can find to explore on it. I think as he matures and understands what a food truck really is, he will enjoy it even more. It grows with a child. It is also not that bulky for an average living room or den.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Savopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and great price!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old is obsessed. He learned the word taco and he drives the car. He places the cookies into the shape sorter, he dances to the music and loves putting the smoothies away. Everyone loves he toy when they come visit.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastMama

customer_reviews.title: Great gift but arrived in used condition !
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great play center for my one year old goddaughter, her 5 year old brother and 7 year old sister! The assembly instructions were very specific and easy to follow along with!! The only thing I had issue with was that the stickers and batteries would have been much easier to put on before assembling the whole thing. My main reason for reducing stars is that I received a used item. Someone obviously tried putting this together and then returned it. I am gifting it anyway since my goddaughter a birthday is tomorrow. However, I am really unhappy that I paid so much for something used and in imperfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marysia

customer_reviews.title: I think this Is the only toy he liked from Santa
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons 1st Christmas ... he is 12 months old... I think this Is the only toy he liked from Santa !!! He has played with this thing all day long and toys hardly ever keep his attention !!! You will not go wrong buying this toy for a boy or girl !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: He love it. He loves playing kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 2 year old son! He love it. He loves playing kitchen. Truck is very easy to put together and very well made. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ayisha rana

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Cute truck however it’s not very user-friendly for its intended purpose of having small infant children and toddlers the light up and push buttons are not very user-friendly and very stiff and they seem to have a manufacturing error where it doesn’t actually work with the sound and lighting Like I said it’s a cute truck it does have a few cute features and if it worked properly then it would be a gem however this is the second truck that we’ve had that has the same problem it must be something to do with the manufacturing design of it
customer_reviews.author: Mason morton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a new walker very sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy and so does my daughter. It’s very sturdy unlike some of her other toys like this at this price. All the little things that make sounds are so much fun for her to play with. My daughter can mess all the stuff up I put where it goes in under a minute, but it takes me 2 mins to put it all back, but she is young and hasn’t learned how to play nicely yet, I got this because she started walking at 9 months and needed something to play with while she walked, this was perfect in height and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: My Toddler Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We saw this toy over at a friends house and the kids all loved playing with it so we ordered one for our son. There are three levels to the songs/sounds it makes in terms of how advanced they are. My son loves making us smoothies and tacos in it and can entertain himself for quite a while playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: GoJacks

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute toy! My five year old picked this to give to his little brother for his first birthday. Kids must know what other kids like because they both love it! It took about 15 minutes to assemble-super easy. Just a handful of screws and the other pieces snap together. Comes with a lot of food pieces, and the songs, etc. are cute and got my one year old dancing!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R Birkenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Fun for years.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy a year and a half ago for Christmas for our then 1 year old. She is almost 3 and is still having a blast with it. It’s super easy to drag our of the bedroom and set in the middle of the living room when friends come over. All of the kiddos have been drawn to it!! I also have to say that sometimes we pretend to drive it and play ambulance too ☺️. I like this much better than a regular kitchen. Well done fisher-price. Well done. Also, the 8 year old neighbor loves coming over to play with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your kid.
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo son loves this. He plays with it every day. Assembly was pretty easy with only a screwdriver. Quality seems okay with some of the stickers peeling around a edge or 2. It is suppose to come with 5 different order cards but we got 2 burger cards and no cookie card, but a call to fisher price solved that. They sent us a new set of cards and food to go with it. A great product and great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: KENNY MUY

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this, I had to have it for my 1 year old! I originally was going to wait until possibly next Christmas to give it to him. I'm really glad I didn't. He's a smaller baby but it still is just right. The truck is smaller than I thought. Its pretty stable too. He LOVES it! Super easy to put together. My 4 and 6 year old also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kids toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my niece for her 2nd birthday. I really bought it because I enjoy cooking and I wanted to subliminally train her so she can help me run a real food truck someday, but that's a whole different story. Assembly was relatively quick and easy, and it comes with a lot of cool stuff to help with learning. I also just found out that it's her favorite toy, and definitely cheaper than some of her other stuff. I'm guessing she'll probably enjoy it for at least a couple more years, so I would absolutely recommend this product. It's also pretty portable since they seem to bring it with them to a lot of places.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Came with cracked piece
customer_reviews.text: Very cute product. Our 12 month old is enjoying playing with all of the little pieces. Will be fun for her to grow into. Reason for 1 star was because my unit was damaged. Put it together Christmas Eve and the next to last piece was cracked. Went through Fisher Price to see if I could purchase a part versus having to return the whole thing. That wasn’t possible so now they’re sending me a new unit and I have to pay to return this one. Thought about returning through Amazon at that point but FP was already sending another.
customer_reviews.author: Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Saw this at my little cousin's house and ordered it for my grandson, ON THE SPOT!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES this!! It's the first thing he looks for when he comes in the house. It provides so much to do and possibilities are endless beyond the various skill levels for enrichment and interest.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Hours!!
customer_reviews.text: This food truck was a Christmas gift for my two year old daughter. We put this gift together Christmas Eve with no issue. Directions were clear and simple. We made the mistake of letting our daughter open this first and then couldn’t get her to open anything else for about a half and hour! Even after opening all of her other many gifts, this was her very favorite. It occupied her all day long and now, more than a month later, it is still her favorite toy and she plays with it every single day! Best toy purchase in a long time and I have four kids, so lots of toy experience ;).
customer_reviews.author: Jiawmom

customer_reviews.title: It's very functional and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my 18 month nephew, and I'm sure he will love it. It has a sizzling grill, water faucet noises, and a trash receptacle that connects to inner fridge door; so the items get returned after a "customer" is finished! There's even a drying rack to hold the plate, spatula, and fork! And a shelf above the fridge that fits the desserts. I was having fun and I'm in my 30s! My one criticism was there could be extra plates.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my Tasmanian Devil busy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy! So many different sounds! My 20 month old is a little firecracker and chucks and throws most toys we give him and this one has kept him entertained. As soon as I was done setting it up he ran right over and was touching everything and so engaged in playing with this toy! Great idea and nice and sturdy for my rough toddler. Give yourself time to set this up it takes a bit but it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: All kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for my 1 year old and all visiting kids up to 7 have been obsessed with it! It’s smaller than expected but packs in plenty it activities. Tons of sounds but they aren’t in a super annoying voice, it’s tolerable. Wish there was a little basket under to toss the pieces in when not in use. Only took 10 mins to assemble
customer_reviews.author: SG24

customer_reviews.title: So cute.  Well-made.  So very Fisher- Price quality, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be for my 15 month old grandson but his 4 other brothers and sisters all got in the act and they all love playing in this! The oldest is 8, and she loves it too! They are all kept entertained, for as long as you can keep little kids entertained until they get rambunctious and it’s time to find something else to do with them! A very well made item though, colorful and a lot of little activities to keep them busy for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Bevilacqua

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for big age range!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter’s 1st Birthday, she LOVES it. There are tons of little buttons and accessories to play with and she is able to hold on while standing (not walking yet), there’s also plenty to do while sitting. The stickers are pretty flimsy and one ripped while I was putting it on, but otherwise it took 20 minutes to assemble. Great gift for 10 mos-2 years olds!!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves this! It does take a little bit to put together so make sure you do it when your kiddo is sleeping. Very interactive and food items are very durable. Does require 3 AA batteries so make sure you grab some before it arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hetzler

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my turning one-year-old-granddaughter. She not only loves it (so many activities included for her little fingers!), but her three big brothers (ages 6, 4 & 2-1/2) love it too. Therein lies the problem, so there's often some squabbles over it. Quality is very structurally sound, amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this toy. He got ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this toy. He got it for Christmas. My 9 year year old plays with it too. The only negative thing is the stickers do not line it which drove me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lind

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: Best toy I've ever purchased! I got this for my 1 yr old birthday hoping it'd be something her 5 yr old sister would play with her with and I was right. They play with it every day and it's a hit with every kid that comes over! Its a little bulky but overall doesn't take up too much space for everything you can do with it. Also very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Eribra

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but was weeks late
customer_reviews.text: The little kitchen itself was great once I got it. The 2 year old girl it went to loved it and still plays with it. But, this was one of the most annoying purchases I have ever ordered from Amazon!! What made it worse is that it was a gift. I kept getting notices that it would be late, and then I'd get another notice that it would be even later. This kept going for weeks. I bought it on Prime Day so was a reduced price and I felt like they just kept trying to get me to cancel the order.
customer_reviews.author: V. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Beware of seller!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine. Kids loved it. BUT seller claimed it was new and it very obviously was not!! There was what looked like grape jelly on several of the parts and some kind of pet hair and grass, scratches, etc. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhesa Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all toddler ages & doesn't take up too much room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 month old daughter. She absolutely loves this thing! Along with her 3 year old brother and 2 year old cousin. They all have the best time playing. There is a lot of learning activities on it (numbers, letters, shapes) and music. I love that there is 2 volume settings! I would recommend to anyone who has toddlers for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves dancing to the different music and pretend to eat the food. Granite for now she mainly knocks a lot of the stuff down if I put it on the "counter top," but I can already tell she will play with this toy until probably 5yrs old. Super durable too, easy to put together with the instructions, you do need a steady hand for all the stickers though. Ultimately though, great purchase for a good range of age and gender.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this! My son and his friends love it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this food truck. I was looking for something interactive that he would find interesting and this is perfect since it has a cash register, a recycling bin, a refrigerator, and he can “drive it”. Didn’t take very long to put together and also doesn’t take up much space which is great. It is sturdy but if you have a kid like mine that likes to push things around, it could tip over, but only if they are actively looking to tip it. Overall very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! But mind the Negative!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 19 month old. The bright colors and lights, fun sounds and catchy music this thing plays holds her attention for hours. The small design makes it so everything is accessible to her and easy for her to use. It was surprisingly easy to assemble and the instructions were very clear. Negative: It is crazy lightweight. A toddler laying it's full weight through the window or leaning too heavily on it could topple this thing over. So make sure to supervise your kids carefully while playing.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 month old about a month ago from Target. She plays with it daily! Very neat interactive toy that she can grow with and will have for many years. Super easy to assemble with one person. Instructions clear. We actually bought this one for our nieces birthday, turning 4. Nice quality, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this. My son absolutely loves it as well. He plays with it all the time. It is a bit small, but works awesome. I wish there was storage under the steering wheel so if I wanted to add things. But it is perfect for my 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna

customer_reviews.title: Used, dirty!
customer_reviews.text: Check out the reviews for this item by RECENT. As you will see, many people have written recent reviews stating that their food truck was delivered used. Same issue here. Smudges, damage, dirt... gross. I literally exchanged the product three times. Every single time it came used. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Dene

customer_reviews.title: Yes, a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Our little one year old grandson loves to play peek-a-Boo through the windows and throw all the foods out too. His older brother (age 7) and sister (age 5) love playing with him too and put all the foods back in place. Easy to assemble but slides around too easily so we put a blanket underneath. He loves it and we love watching them play together.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The way in which this product is pictured is very deceiving. This product is very small and not suitable for the ages in which it is advertised for. It is advertised for 18-36 months. My son just turned 2 and he is very small for his age and this product a miniature. Definitely not suitable for 18-36 months!
customer_reviews.author: JDanishek

customer_reviews.title: Another Hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2-year old Granddaughter for Christmas. It was a hit then, and she still loves it 4 months later. Definitely feeds the imagination. She enjoys serving up tacos, burgers and shakes to her family. It even has a trash/recycle bin. Not too difficult to assemble and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this item for her 2nd birthday. She absolutely loves to play with the food truck. She enjoys all the sounds and songs she can play! I love that the grill and sink make realistic noises, making play time even more fun. My only complaint is that I don't understand why more wasn't done for the driving portion. I think adding even a squeaky horn would make it more fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Emmily Starman

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I have an 2 and 4 year old and they both love this little food truck. Its small, but it comes with a lot, and it doesn't end up taking up so much space in their room, so whatever. We just got it a couple weeks ago and my kids have played with it everyday since.
customer_reviews.author: SGB

customer_reviews.title: Great play set for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We've had this toy for almost a year and my daughter loves it! Still plays with it (even though half the food sadly has been lost). We just bought plastic food from another set and it still works! One of the only play sets that keeps her entertained after all this time!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Another great Fisher Price Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a black friday deal to give to my one year old as a birthday gift and it is an absolute hit! It is a little smaller thane expected however my son loves hitting the buttons, hearing the music and sticking his head through the windows! This did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyV123

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves his food truck!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew (1 year) LOVES his food truck! He loves all the fun sounds and songs it makes, even mom and dad don't mind all the noise! The truck has SO many features and accessories that keep him happy for hours! It was very wasy for dad to assemble and had it together in no time! It doesn't take up too much room either. This will be something my nephew will be able to play with for at least the next couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Winn

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 2 yr. old daughter but my 6 yr old son likes to play with it as well. Very cute, lots of things to play with and keeps the kids' imagination flowing. I got this on sale for half the normal price - even though my kids love playing with it, I think $70 is a bit steep.
customer_reviews.author: txsqueek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for boys!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and 2 year old both love this food truck! Super easy to put together. I chose to buy this over a kitchen set since we have two boys who love cars and trucks. This was a Christmas gift and it has been used everyday since then! Fisher-price always gets it right when it comes to “Santa Gifts”!
customer_reviews.author: Dyaneschlader

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This little food truck is adorable! We got it for my 16 month old for Christmas and I think it was her favorite gift. She had no problem figuring out how to use all the different parts of the food truck. It was a little hard to get all the stickers placed perfectly but that could just be me being a perfectionist. Overall, love this!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This so called Deluxe food truck is the same toy that you can purchase for $49 on Amazon. Fisher Price does NOT make a deluxe version of this toy.
customer_reviews.author: lindyj

customer_reviews.title: My kids (1 and 3) have enjoyed playing with this
customer_reviews.text: My kids (1 and 3) have enjoyed playing with this. Didn't take too long to get together. Pretty durable except stickers can be peeled (or chewed) off easily. Does tip over if little ones lean on top too much. Great accessories and the recycling bin with door is a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, we love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my toddler. As soon as he saw it he walked right up and started playing with everything and dancing to the music. It’s such a cute, detailed play set. Easy to assemble. Comes with a lot of little pieces I’m afraid we will lose or get chewed up by the dog, but it does have a compartment for storage.
customer_reviews.author: FDH

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Loves It
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than what it appears in the product video, but overall a decent buy. My 2-year-old loves this. It is hard to put together, you are basically forcing screws into unthreaded plastic so you do have to have some strength. I would not spend a lot of money on this so look for the best deal possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie A.

customer_reviews.title: Small but well loved
customer_reviews.text: This little food truck is very small, in the picture with the toddler it can be assumed that the cute little model is petite as a normal sized one year old stands a bit taller than the truck itself. That being said, the normal one year old still adores playing with the truck even 3 month after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: happy person

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew started walking around 10 months so I thought this would be a fun gift for him, and I was right! My bro & SIL would tell me that he played with it all the time which made me so happy! Because it was such a great gift for him, I then bought one for my godson as well. My friends told me that he was also playing with it constantly. Love that there are 3 learning modes so you can adjust as they learn!
customer_reviews.author: bootyboop24

customer_reviews.title: Easily moves
customer_reviews.text: Personally I’m not a huge fan of this product. This product moves around easily when my child pushes it- it doesn’t matter if it’s on hardwood or carpet. I don’t feel comfortable letting my son play with it because I’m scared it will fall on him since it moves so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha I

customer_reviews.title: Our little loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our one year old’s birthday after he saw it at his cousins house and LOVED it. We were happy to find hat he loves it just as much in our house and plays with it daily. It’s helped him start standing without assistance and we couldn’t be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for my one and three year old children!
customer_reviews.text: This has provided hours and hours of fun for my three year old and one year old daughters! It is a great toy for this age group— very sturdy, colorful and fun looking, and lots of things of interest to do on it for this age group. I don’t think you can go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: RFamily

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s first birthday, couldn’t be happier! Usually he plays with a new toy for a few hours and it inevitably ends up forgotten in the toy bin within a day or two. So far, he’s played with this every day for the last 4 days! He loves it and so does his older sister, it’s the only toy that actually gets her to engage with him through play. Hands down, best toy for a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serving Up Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this truck! Keeps his busy body self occupied for hours. It's cute and easy to put together. It's even kitty approved! This is great fun for the toddler... highly recommend! Extra star!... for bacon and avacado slices to put on the play burger!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 ye old and he loves it. There is a bunch of things to do to keep it fun. Grill sizzles faucets makes water sound bell dings and more. All the pieces have their place so it’s easily maintainable. I think it might be too small for a 3 yr old. When my boy stands next to it it’s up to his head and he’s a tiny guy
customer_reviews.author: J Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Both my sons love playing with this together! They are 3 and 1. You can put cards in the cash register and it tells you how to make different things. The grill and faucet also make noise/light up when you press them. The smoothie holders make noises too. Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old plays with this every day and it’s fun for us parents too lol
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandchildren and they loved it because it has all their favorite activities all in one. It is not a large item and stores easy. Perfect for a two year old up to 4 maybe 5 year old. More of a sit and play position. Not stand and play. Just FYI. Alot of fun for 2 kids or child and parent to role play. Good quality. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: kimothy

customer_reviews.title: best toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a treasure. As soon as the boys started crawling they crawled to it. They can pull up on it and mess with stuff. it has occupied them happily for hours. It exceeded expectations. They are completely into the 3 cups and the taco. It is perfect for the soon to be walking.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lori

customer_reviews.title: Taco Truck Fun
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my one year old and it’s a hit for all the kiddos in my house (4 and 6YO, too). It is the cutest food set I’ve seen and love all the food accessories. Also like it has different ‘levels’ based on your kid’s age. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This is a hit with our 4YO and 1YO. All kids (all ages) who come over are drawn to this. The only potential improvement would be to give it real wheels--my son is prone to "driving" it down the halls even though it is wheel-less! 😝 Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Tall Ones

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids (ages 3, 18 mos and 8) just love it. They have gotten hours of play with it. They love to visit and get their turn taking orders. It is absolutely worth the price. The 18 mos old loves it just as much as the older kids and we have had hours of fun with it. This keeps them busy when other toys may just keep them interested for a few minutes, so it is Grandma helper!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my nephew, he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Super interactive, great for kids of various ages. Bought it for my nephews first birthday and he loves it! My twins are also a year old and they all play together when we go over. The pieces can get thrown everywhere since theres so many, but you can easily take those away until theyre of age to use them as intended versus frisbees lol
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my 9 month old and after a month of having it this toy is no doubt our favorite. We love the songs and it keeps her entertained daily. We were a little worried that she would be too little for it but with supervision it can be lots of fun (we’ve had our fingers pinched by shutting the trash can lid on them)
customer_reviews.author: hanah

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love This
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday gift for my 1-year old grandson. EVERY CHILD at the party loved this present and was the hit of the day. If you can find this, not easy to do, then i recommend buying it and putting it up for a child within the 1 yr. to 4 yr. old range. Even older kids loved this and played with it
customer_reviews.author: jac4123

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this very quickly (you only need a screwdriver). And my son the daredevil climbs on this thing through the window and we haven’t had any breakage or wear on it. Great toy for kids. Batteries weren’t included but it does make cool sounds and has multiple levels for you child’s learning.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Let them use their imagination!
customer_reviews.text: Another great idea from Fisher Price! Purchased for my grandson’s first birthday and I’m sure he’ll get a lot of use out of it as it has many features that will be used as he gets bigger. Fun details, colorful, well made. Great for indoor play without taking up a ton of space.
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: My twins LOVE this toy
customer_reviews.text: My twins LOVE this toy! We opened it for them when they were just over one year old. It held the interest of our 3 and 6 year old house guests too. Happy this will be a toy that will stick around for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 y/o Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy! My 1 y/o loves it and tried to climb it too, it’s pretty sturdy seems they thought of that happening! My 5 y/o who looks huge next to it has fun with it too! There are lots of accessories that have found their way all over our play area, so that’s important to keep in mind (Foods, cups, plate, recipe cards).
customer_reviews.author: YarmoFam

customer_reviews.title: Interactive
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month loves playing with her food truck. My 7 year old likes to play with his little sister when she is playing with this. Lots of songs and activities to keep their attention of only for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good luck...not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing. The toy takes a while to assemble. After 1.5 hours of assembly, we discovered the toy was defected. We tried 3 sets of batteries. Tried to exchange, but the toy wouldn’t be available for 1-2 months (to ship!!).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas - she is 21 months old and the size is perfect and she loves all the activities this food truck has. Plays for hours with it. This item would be a little too small for an older preschooler
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for one year old twins
customer_reviews.text: The gift was sent to Ireland, it was so excitedly received and the twins love it! The only thing that was a bummer was I paid as much to ship it there as the item cost
customer_reviews.author: NBmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old granddaughter and she loves playing with it. She likes how the food cards talk to you when inserted in the slots. I do wish the steering wheel made sounds or at least a horn but overall great toy
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Huskey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy! Highly recommend for one and up!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Best birthday gift for a one year old. She plays with this daily! Easy to assemble! Put the thing together in minutes. Sturdy toy. My daughter loves it she’s the size of about a 2-3 year old and it is still a good size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Verdugo

customer_reviews.title: LO loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as my LO's 1yo birthday gift and he totally love it and play it everyday ever since it was opened up. The assembly might take a bit of a time. The food, drinks, utensils, cash register cards are all very cute and easy for LO to grab and hold on to. Highly recommended as a gift or just for your LO to learn and play.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci Lau

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, good value for the price I paid but could be better
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 11 month old and 2 year old boys. It's an awesome idea but it's kinda small. Also their isn't enough storage for the toys that come with it. This is probably my least favorite big interactive big toy for baby and toddlers we have ever got.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: my sons favorite toy, but does turn a little black after ...
customer_reviews.text: my sons favorite toy, but does turn a little black after use, but I would still buy it as my son loves loves loves this toy. he received it right before he was one and its 6 months later and still keeps him entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already!!
customer_reviews.text: Would buy this again no question about it my 1 year old got things Christmas and loves it...and so do her 3 older siblings (5,11 and 13) I've caught all 4 playing restaurant/coffee shop together with her on multiple occasions it's big enough to have lots of fun but not so huge it's gets in the way we LOVE this at our house!! Update...its almost been a year and this is still played with almost daily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Painted Lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble (took me less than 30 minutes), super cute and durable play food and the best part is my 2 year old LOVES it and plays with it all the time. Why can't all kid toys be this great?
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR, AWESOME FOOD TRUCK! GREAT FOR KIDS!
customer_reviews.text: This food truck was a gift for my brother’s kid, she’s 2 years old and she loves it! She plays with it like every single day, which is great! The food truck is very easy to assemble, like you only need a screwdriver and they provide tons of nails and some stickers. Also, there’s tons of food options and there’s like sounds for clicking on different toys! 5 Star for the Food Truck!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Toddler food truck
customer_reviews.text: There was a bit of delay with the delivery but once the truck came my hubby put it together rather quickly and my 18 month old LOVES it. Doesn’t come with batteries so have some handy because you little one will want to play with it IMMEDIATELY LOL
customer_reviews.author: Arnaut

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Present For Littles 🎄🎄🎄
customer_reviews.text: Pure joy!! This is entertaining and provides endless hours of play. Perfect for one child or a few. The food is adorable and easy for little hands to assemble. So many sound effects and things to do that it keeps your little active and curious.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great product but it arrived with some cosmetic damage.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. Our (almost) 1 year old has been enjoying it before we even had it completely assembled! The only downfall is that it looks to have been previously owned with some scuffing, dents and even dirt. There was also an important screw missing, but it’s not worth returning and he will inevitably scuff it with time as well. I often buy things second hand, but when I buy something at full price it can be frustrating to find it “used”. Otherwise, it really is a great 1st birthday gift for out little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Kephale

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is my 1 year olds absolute favorite toy. Every single morning she wakes up I bring her into our living room and she goes straight for the food truck. I also think it’s very cute and I love the music and interaction it includes.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2yr olds birthday and she absolutely loves it . Assembly was a little challenging, but I did have a 2yr old in my face wanting to play. Fun toy
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Frans

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for 2-4 years of age.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy kids love it. It does come in lots of pieces to assemble to include adding the stickers which is kind of a pain. But 2-4 year old fight over so I would say the toy is a hit.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: So fun and interactive!
customer_reviews.text: We have a1 year old and a 4 year old. This toy is developmentally appropriate for both! There are so many creative play aspects for older toddlers, as well as engaging lights and music for younger babes. They love making food for one another!
customer_reviews.author: Jahosh

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Servin Up Fun Food Truck
product_meta.description: Order up! With two full sides of toddler-friendly learning fun, the Laugh & Learn Servin' Up Fun Food Truck serves up hours of role play and hands-on activities. Its blend of kitchen and vehicle play keeps mini-entrepreneurs busy—greeting customers, working the register, prepping "orders" on the light-up grill, and more. And while they're engaged in all that super fun role play, toddlers are also being introduced to sizing and sequencing, advanced vocabulary, manners, taking turns, and more with lively songs, sounds, and phrases! Three Smart Stages levels offer up different songs, sounds, and phrases, so the learning fun can keep going as your child keeps growing. Where development comes into play Academics: Sung songs and phrases teach toddlers about size and sequencing, counting 1-20, and expanded vocabulary. Collaboration Skills: This super fun food truck encourages kids to play together and practice taking turns being the chef and customer! Creativity & Imagination: Children engage in early role play as they interact with the grill, sink, food pieces, cash register, and steering wheel.
feature_bullets: Pretend food truck with 2 sides of toddler-friendly play and 20+ removable play pieces
“Magical” cash register reads all 4 menu cards "Ring up" orders by pressing the number buttons, and push the music button for a playlist of learning songs and more
Interactive food prep area, including a sink, light-up grill & service bell, plus activity-filled dashboard
3 Smart stages learning levels with 125+ songs, sounds, and phrases

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
